name: CENTURY 21 North Homes Realty - Burlington Office

reviews.author: Forrest Hopkins
reviews.review: Brenda ensured we had the best opportunity to secure the type of house we were looking for. Incredibly quick response time, and her knowledge of the market was phenomenal. She is very upfront and honest about every situation that arose,

reviews.author: Susan T
reviews.review: We met Brenda one summer day while working on a home in Granite Falls that had belonged to our eldest brother, who passed away in July 2020. Brenda was extremely helpful throughout the remodeling process, helping us to locate subs for

reviews.author: Sarah Midura
reviews.review: Brenda Sweet was extremely communicative, professional and personable. She let us know her responsibilities and when someone else would be helping us with an aspect of our purchase (such as the title company, escrow, lender) and made the process as painless as possible. We would work with her again in a heartbeat.

reviews.author: Cori Hoffman
reviews.review: My review is based solely on Kimberli Gregory who is the property manager. She is the most unprofessional person I have EVER worked with. She is a flake in every way. She does not get things handled, says she will do things and never does.

reviews.author: Trenia Zavala
reviews.review: Have stored my stuff here for five years never a problem very easy to pay online feature,.. easy access 7days a week down fall the bathrooms are not available after office hours makes it hard when you have to bring children with but that's all ..

reviews.author: Nicole Scofield
reviews.review: I was very disrespected by Kimberli a property manager. I'm not upset that I did not get the place i had applied for. I'm upset how she treated me. Shes very unprofessional when talking to potential tenants and a liar. I suggest you do not

reviews.author: Sandra Glenn
reviews.review: My team with Christina O'Keefe made this the easiest experience I've had in selling my home. Relaxed, knowledgeable, and uplifting emails keeping me up to date every step of the way!

reviews.author: Thepeacefulwarrior400years
reviews.review: Very nice realty company. I'm actually thinking of working there so I stopped in to see who I need to contact for the training. Brenda at the front desk was very nice and helpful.

reviews.author: Frank Starr
reviews.review: Great people work here. They will take care of your house/home shopping. Ask for Duane or Kenda!

reviews.author: Sarah Merickel
reviews.review:
This place is great! Integrity, Service, Results!
Great people they are a team or really a family

reviews.author: Connie Moulaison
reviews.review: Century 21 offers excellent real estate services and professional Real Estate photography!

reviews.author: Heather Matyas
reviews.review: The rental department really cares about people

reviews.author: Trevir Faley
reviews.review: Helpful, and professional agents and brokers
